title: Staffer dupes pvt finance firm of Rs 13 lakh - DTNext
content: Staffer dupes pvt finance firm of Rs 13 lakh  DTNext
description: A staffer of a private finance firm has been arrested by the Chengalpattu police for cheating the employer to the tune of Rs 13 lakh after getting a loan in the name of a women self-help group, in Tirukazhukundram.
